WorkItem.Description:
I am trying to read a Excel file with formula's in most of my columns. Then I receive this error.

PHP Fatal error:  Uncaught exception 'PHPExcel_Exception' with message 'ISM-XE1203FI63TRX91!AI7 -> ISM-XE1203FI63TRX91!AO9 -> ISM-XE1203FI63TRX91!AN9 -> ISM-XE1203FI63TRX91!AM9 -> ISM-XE1203FI63TRX91!AP9 -> ISM-XE1203FI63TRX91!AN9 -> Cyclic Reference in Formula' in /abc//Classes/PHPExcel/Cell.php:307
Stack trace:
#0 /abc/reader.php(226): PHPExcel_Cell->getCalculatedValue()
#1 /abc//reader.php(132): calculateFormula(Object(PHPExcel_Worksheet), 'AI7')
#2 /abc/reader.php(36): readTemplateData('tmp/Template...')
#3 {main}
  thrown in /abc/Classes/PHPExcel/Cell.php on line 307

Any idea how to resolve this ?.

Comments.Message: This is the correct default behaviour for cyclic formulae
